document_data.mainbody:
Esselyn Xharn was a town guard who lived in the settlement of Idyllglen.
Esselyn was present in Idyllglen when Yeenoghu assaulted the settlement with his demonic horde. Esselyn and the other guards protected their fellow citizens during the battle. However, in the conflict they were covered in demon ichor, which caused temporarily madness and gave them urges for cannibalism.
